title: Выйти нельзя остаться
overview: The story is about real feelings, sex and loneliness in isolation, where the level of frankness that comes from a lack of tactility, communication and intimacy is reached.After a difficult breakup, Bai Lu went to Berlin for a couple of days, but was stuck there for several months. Dying of loneliness, she decides to take a desperate step - to find a guy without leaving the house. The quarantine caught her friends in Moscow by surprise - an abandoned bride, lack of money and experiments with a webcam, two children and endless work. Isolation will definitely change their lives, but in which direction?
